headline: Why Interactive Brokers (IBKR) Is Up 10.9% After Clients Beat the S&P 500 in 2025 – And What's Next
summary: In early January 2026, Interactive Brokers Group reported December 2025 metrics showing 3.384 million Daily Average Revenue Trades, client equity of US$779.9 billion, 40% higher margin loan balances year over year, and 4.399 million client accounts, up 32% from the prior year. The firm also disclosed that its clients, including individual and hedge fund investors, outperformed the S&P 500 Index in 2025, underscoring how low trading costs, execution quality, and broad global market access can...
